summary: Frontend-only testing completed for AlphaView AI Interview Assistant static website. All requested features are working correctly: auto-scrolling testimonials, varied non-stereotypical names, Resumes page with upload functionality, Past Interviews page with table view, and responsive mobile layout.

issues: Navigation items in sidebar don't have data-testid attributes, unlike resumes.html and past-interviews.html - consider adding for consistency

critical_code_review_comments: CSS and HTML are well-structured with good use of CSS variables
All interactive elements on resumes.html and past-interviews.html have proper data-testid attributes
Consider adding data-testid attributes to download.html navigation items for consistency
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features are working correctly. The site uses static HTML files served through React's dev server. Key files: index.html (landing page with testimonials), resumes.html (upload functionality), past-interviews.html (table view), download.html (dashboard), styles.css (main styles), app.js (JavaScript interactions).

test_results.landing_page_hero_section: PASS - Hero section with title 'Undetectable, Intelligent, Always Ready' displays correctly
test_results.testimonials_auto_scroll: PASS - Testimonials marquee with CSS animation (marquee-scroll 40s linear infinite) working
test_results.testimonials_varied_names: PASS - Names verified: Alex Turner, Maya Johnson, Chris Anderson, Marcus Lee, Ravi Krishnan, Sophie Martinez, Daniel Park, Sam Wilson, Emma Chen, Tanya Brooks, Kevin Tanaka, Nikita Sharma
test_results.testimonials_pause_on_hover: PASS - CSS rule '.testimonials-track:hover { animation-play-state: paused !important; }' implemented
test_results.resumes_page_upload_dropzone: PASS - Upload dropzone visible with drag and drop support
test_results.resumes_page_your_resumes_section: PASS - 'Your Resumes' section with empty state displayed correctly
test_results.past_interviews_table_headers: PASS - Headers: Title, Description, Duration, AI Usage, Created At, Actions
test_results.past_interviews_empty_state: PASS - Empty state 'No interviews yet' displayed correctly
test_results.navigation_between_pages: PASS - Navigation between Home, Past Interviews, CVs/Resumes, Sign out works correctly
test_results.mobile_responsive_layout: PASS - Mobile viewport tested at 390x844, responsive layout working
